welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Central Falls, a charming city known for its historic charm and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights to nearby cities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial airlines and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport is the busiest and largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at State Airport is smaller and caters to regional and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
